LanguageData.ResearchNanoStorage.label: Nano Storage
LanguageData.ResearchNanoStorage.description: Research how to expand your storage capabilities with nano technology.
LanguageData.ResearchNanoStorage.descriptionDiscovere: Now you can build a specialized storage. Each nano storage can hold up to ten items.
LanguageData.ResearchNanoReplication.label: Nano Replication
LanguageData.ResearchNanoReplication.description: Research how to modify your nano bots to replicate objects.
LanguageData.ResearchNanoReplication.descriptionDisco: Now you can build a nano printer. It has the capability to replicate scanned items.
